attributes.action: We the Undersigned, call on David Cameron to call an Immediate General Election
attributes.additional_details: The Out campaign was misleading and Unjust with promises made that will be never kept, The main parties are in chaos, the people deserve better than this, a General Election must be called with clear mandates for all parties laid bare for a REAL DECISION
attributes.background: The referendum lies in shame, he has resigned, Labour are in chaos, it is time for all the so called main parties to unite under what they genuinely represent and allow the people of Britain to vote for what they want, including a final majority position for a Government who are In or Out of the EU
